name: BGSjam6 - "The Wild West"
description:
Check out this collection of games made during BGSjam6, the sixth official game jam of WNY-based non-profit Buffalo Game Space! In 48 hours, creators worked around the clock to make games about "The Wild West" and made platformers, rail shooters, VR shooting galleries, bartending simulators, 8-player local capture the flag, and more!

NOTE: The games in this pack are provided as-is. There may be bugs or odd hardware requirements.
